home.description: Helloüôè, my name is Nonthachai Phosri. I am a software developer with experience in developing fullstack web applications using React, Vue, Nuxt3, Node.js, and MySQL. I can develop and maintain both frontend and backend parts and am committed to learning new technologies to develop efficient applications that meet user needs. I hope to bring my skills to benefit your organization. üéâ

project.title: My Projects
project.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

projectOne.title: Graduation Project
projectOne.description: Graduation project at RMUTI CPE (64241A) ‚Äì Market Stall Booking System
projectOne.detail: Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP (no frameworks). Integrated with APIs and a database, including login functionality and features for booking market stall spaces.

projectTwo.title: Internship Project
projectTwo.description: Internal project management system for an organization
projectTwo.detail: Frontend developed with Nuxt 3, Vue.js, and Vuetify. Backend built with Node.js, Express, and MySQL. Includes user authentication and multiple modules to manage internal projects.

projectThree.title: Skill Practice Project During Job Search (Built-in Company)
projectThree.description: Inventory management system for a built-in furniture company
projectThree.detail: Frontend developed with Next.js and React using Material UI. Backend built with Node.js, Express, and MySQL. Features authentication and various modules for inventory management. Took on a Fullstack role as well as BA/SA responsibilities, coordinating with the company, scheduling meetings, and presenting the project with a 4-person team. The project was well-received by the management, but could not proceed due to contract agreement issues.

projectFour.title: Skill Practice Project During Job Search (Secondhand Stock Management)
projectFour.description: Inventory management system for secondhand products
projectFour.detail: Frontend developed with Vue and Vuetify. Backend built with Node.js, Express, and MySQL using Sequelize ORM. Includes authentication and complete stock management functionality. Took full responsibility as a Fullstack developer, building the entire system independently.
